eventSummary: The BreachLaboratory threat actor claims to have breached Bank Mandiri in Indonesia, allegedly leaking over 18,000 financial records including personal details, SWIFT code BMRIIDJA, account setup data, balances, fees, and debit card usage information. Sources: - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m6muby7wuv2x
